summary: Snow White and her new friends must rescue the Prince when he is captured by the Wicked Queen's vengeful brother.
cast: Edward Asner|Irene Cara|Carol Channing|Dom DeLuise|Phyllis Diller|Zsa Zsa Gabor|Linda Gary|Jonathan Harris|Michael Horton|Sally Kellerman|Malcolm McDowell|Tracey Ullman|Frank Welker
title: Blancanieves y el castillo encantado
